categories: Category:Events during the First Order–Resistance war

nodes.text:
Soon after the escape of the Resistance operatives off of Kijimi, Darth Sidious ordered
Allegiant General Enric Pryde and the Sith Eternal to destroy the First Order occupied planet.
Shortly after the duel on Kef Bir, a crew of Resistance members, except for Jedi apprentice Rey, returned to the Ajan Kloss base in defeat. Soon after, they learned of Leia Organa's death.

Sensing Organa's death and Ben Solo's redemption, Darth Sidious contacted Enric Pryde to launch the Sith Eternal plan. After Pryde pledged himself and the First Order to the Sith Lord, thus forming the Final Order, Sidious ordered him to send a Xyston-class Star Destroyer to a world the Resistance was familiar with.
The Sith Star Destroyer Derriphan was sent to Kijimi, and, after Captain Chesille Sabrond gave the command, its superlaser destroyed the entire planet.

The Resistance soon learned about the world's destruction. Due to Organa's death, Poe Dameron was made general. Going to her corpse, Dameron admitted to her that he did not know what to do and said he was not ready. Just then Galactic Civil War veteran Lando Calrissian arrived, informing Dameron that he, Organa, Han Solo, and Luke Skywalker had also not been ready for their war. After Dameron asked how they were able to defeat the Galactic Empire with almost nothing, Calrissian responded that they had each other.

Learning from this, Dameron made Finn his co-general, and Finn revealed that droid D-O had some information on Rey. After learning that Rey sent intel to R2-D2 regarding the map to Exegol, the Resistance developed a plan to attack the Star Destroyer fleet while Calrissian and Chewbacca would use the Millennium Falcon to call out for allies.
